text: GENERAL SAFETY TRAINING AND REPONSIBILITIES ACKNOWLEDGEMENT FORM Name: Surname: Sabanci University ID #: Department/University: Contact Info: I have participated to the General Safety Orientation and Training. I understand and agree to observe the safety regulations set forth in the Safety Orientation and Training. I further agree to follow any additional printed safety instructions provided. I agree to conduct myself and handle materials and equipment in a safe and responsible manner at all times in the laboratories. I agree to use appropriate personnel protective equipment at all times. I understand that I should not be working alone in the laboratories. I agree to report immediately to the Management about damaged, malfunctioning and broken equipment. I know about Emergency procedures, location of emergency equipment and exits. If I have any long term medical or health problem (e.g. Diabetes, asthma), I will notify the Management in writing. If I neglect these safety rules I understand that I will be given warnings, I may be removed from the laboratories and suspended from future use of laboratories. I realize that failure to observe these instructions could result in serious injury to others and me. I assume full responsibilities for the damages to myself, to others, to the equipment, to the infrastructure resulting from my misconduct. Date : ................ SIGNATURE:...........................
